name: Cymax
overview:
Cymax is a leader in ecommerce retail. We pride ourselves on having excellent customer service, a huge selection of products, and low prices.

Founded in 2004, Cymax began as a retailer specializing in audio and video furniture. From it’s humble beginnings, the company experience quick and steady growth as it expanded into different furniture categories and became an industry leader in customer service.

In 2010 the company broke the $100 million in sales mark and was officially listed as one of the world’s Top 500 online businesses by Internet Retailer.

Cymax has a great culture and a young team. It remains dedicated to retail excellence, great service, and continued innovation as a first-class online retailer.

funding_rounds.source_description: Vancouver's Cymax Stores raises growth financing round

milestones.source_description: The little Online Furniture Shop that Could
